page.title: 16Mrs Daisy Margaret W****
page.content:
Mrs W**** moved to{Thackley End}with her husband 20 years ago, as her daughter and granddaughter lived there. Her husband and daughter died and she is now living with her granddaughter who is 22 years old. Mrs W**** is in her seventies.
She likes everything about Thackley the main things being the peace, tranquility and beautiful scenery.
She does her main shopping in Thackley once a week,at other times she uses the mini-market where she used to be an assistant.She also visits the chapel a lot and walks her dog every day.
